programme.title: Light Years (2021)
programme.desc: Three siblings that have grown apart, find themselves forcibly reunited as they need to sell off their childhood home. They embark on a journey to their hometown in their father’s old car, and the road home forces them to confront their buried conflicts.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: A Wicked Game
programme.desc: A violent assault on a German tourist pits Ambassador Karla Lorenz against friends and fellow diplomats as she tries to discover who is behind this and a string of other attacks on young women in the city.

programme.title: Love Child
programme.desc: Iranian couple, Leila and Sahand, is forced to flee from Tehran with their illegitimate son as their illicit affair is punishable by death. Filmed over the course of five years, the documentary follows the family's journey as they seek refuge in the west.

programme.title: Murders on the Cote Sauvage
programme.desc: Amidst cocaine-laden shores, the discovery of Lagne's body plunges Captain Sarah into a web of intrigue. Together with drugs agent Ben, she navigates dark secrets and treacherous alliances to unveil the truth behind the murders haunting the Côte Sauvage.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: Mammal
programme.desc: Margaret (Rachel Griffiths), a silently grieving divorcee forms an intense bond with Joe (Barry Keoghan), a homeless youth. Their oedipal relationship is threatened by the wrath of Margaret’s ex-husband and Joe’s involvement with a gang of violent youths.

programme.title: Paralympian
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories. The one leg athlete sinks into a deep depression, until one day he is offered to try his luck at the Paralympic games.

A traffic accident in which Camilla, a lawyer, is involved results in the death of a young man. This forces her to investigate and face unfamiliar places and situations. While on this journey, she will meet Bruno and rediscover herself.

programme.title: Dolce Fine Giornata
programme.desc: In Tuscany, Polish Nobel Prize winner Maria's stable family life begins to erode as her relationship with a young immigrant develops against a backdrop of terrorism and eroding democracy.

programme.title: Our River...Our Sky
programme.desc: Baghdad. Sara, a single mother and novelist, shocked into silence by the surrounding violence, has been unable to write. She and her neighbours struggle to resist the fragmentation of their world and renew a fragile sense of hope for a better future.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Woman On The Train
programme.desc: The reveal of the mysterious, new Chief Inspector receives a lukewarm welcome while the unexpected death of the Commissioner sends shockwaves through the Kiel police. With each new lead, it is clear that the situation may be more complex than it seems.

programme.title: Light Years (2021)
programme.desc: Three siblings that have grown apart, find themselves forcibly reunited as they need to sell off their childhood home. They embark on a journey to their hometown in their father’s old car, and the road home forces them to confront their buried conflicts.

programme.title: Summer Rebels
programme.desc: Young Jonas wants to visit his cool grandpa in Slovakia for a summer of fun, but his mom has other plans. Undeterred, Jonas takes off on an adventure of his own in this luminous and light-hearted tale of rebellion, friendship, catastrophe and redemption.

programme.title: Golden Men
programme.desc: Based on a true story. A star-studded heist film with a comedic edge, Golden Men follows a group of desperate men in Turin who attempt an armoured truck robbery.

programme.title: Metamorcactus
programme.desc: A tale of a lonely grieving guy living his life with a cactus after losing his beloved wife to cancer.

programme.title: Diana's Wedding
programme.desc: Through the eyes of Diana, we witness the rollercoaster ride of both her parent’s and Irene’s marriages. To both girls, they have the worst parents in the world. But at the end of the day, which of the couples remain strong and which fall apart ?

programme.title: Paralympian

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Homicide in St. Petersburg

programme.title: Dolce Fine Giornata
